    refreshClientScoreHelper(String, String, int) - Method in class system.GameView

    refreshListenersInPlayerHand(String) - Method in class system.GameController
    Strips all listeners from card buttons in a player's hand and adds new listeners to that hand.
    refreshListenersInPlayerHand(Player) - Method in class system.GameController
    Strips all listeners from a Card button, then adds a single listener back onto it.
    refreshOppHandsHelper(int, int, JPanel) - Method in class system.GameView
    Displays the cards in the opponent's hands.
    refreshOpponentHands(String, int) - Method in class system.GameView
    Displays each opponent's "hand".
    refreshScores(Vector<Player>, boolean) - Method in class system.GameView
    Calls updateScoreTable for every player in the list of players, and also displays the current turn order (clockwise or counterclockwise).
    refreshView() - Method in class system.GameView
    Revalidates and repaints the name and cards of each player.
    removeCardFromHand(Card) - Method in class sysobj.Player
    Removes a card from the player's hand.
    removeCardFromHand(Card) - Method in class system.GameView
    Removes a card image from a player's hand.
    repaintTranslatable() - Method in class system.GameView

    replacePlayer(Player) - Method in class system.GameController
    Replaces a Player object with an AIPlayer object with the same values.
    requestSuitChoice(int, String) - Method in class system.GameServer
    Requests that the client who played an Eight choose a suit for the Eight via a JDialog.
    requestViewRefresh(Vector<Player>, Card, boolean) - Method in class system.GameServer
    Requests that each client refresh their view.
    resetConsole() - Method in class system.GameView
    Resets the player's console to blank.
    resetGameFlags() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Clears the game status.
    resetHands() - Method in class system.GameView
    Resets the player hands to blank.
    resetLastPlayedCard() - Method in class system.GameView
    Resets the last played card's graphic to null.
    resetPlayerNames() - Method in class system.GameView
    Resets the player names to blank.
    resetScoreBoard() - Method in class system.GameView
    Resets the player scoreboard to blank.
    reshuffleSpentDeck() - Method in class system.GameModel
    Conserves the last played card and reshuffles all other cards from the library and played cards into a new library so that players don't try to draw from an empty deck.
    resizeWindow(JPanel) - Method in class system.GameView
    Resizes the Frame (after components have been added to it).
    run() - Method in class system.GameServer.ClientHandler
    Starts the thread that receives messages from the server.
